extendedInfo.description: Fill and Sign any PDF form containing AcroFields. Attach photos, save created document, view it, mail it, share it, etc.Select PDF forms by navigating in file browser or by clicking on 'Fill and Sign' context menu item (shows up after a long touch).Signature capture capability depends on external Signature Capture library. You will be prompted for installation from the Android Market once when needed.*** In order to improve the application we need your feedback **** Contact the support email instead of leaving 'it does not work' comment. Comments like that do not help us make a better app.* Request and vote for missing features on our support forum here: http://bit.ly/e3Tq2h* If you are interested in becoming our beta tester, having an access to the latest app versions even before they get released publicly and, of course, providing us feedback, subscribe to our mailing list here: http://eepurl.com/n5_-X* For custom tailored business applications contact the support email.Important notes:* check boxes are supported but most of PDF viewers on Android devices do not show them correctly. Selected check boxes *are* present in output PDF document which can be checked with Adobe Acrobat Reader on PC.* If you need a tool to create PDF forms, Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office 2010 and free Open Office have that functionality.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great use for it. Minor things like better dragability.
reviews.author: Patience Conway

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works even better than pc apps.
reviews.author: Dawid Farber

reviews.title: app Attracts...
reviews.comment: Simply Superb...app Attracts...app helps...app makes it easy....
reviews.author: Ashok Sinha

reviews.title: Excellent App!!
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app for completing fillable pdf files.  Our 30 plus repair technicians use this app to generate part orders, work orders and preventative maintenance checklists on their smart phones and email them directly to the office and the customer. We previously filled out forms by hand and faxed them.  Now we can actually read everything from our field technicians as well as save those pdf\'s instead of keeping a paper copy. In conjunction with the pay app by this same developer (Signature Capture), we have been able to take a giant leap towards paperless business. This developer has been incredibly responsive as well.  I sent a question regarding an issue and within a week they had resolved it and sent a beta version for me to test.  I have had multiple questions and they are quick to respond. It is still missing a few small things:  Some default formatting does not translate from pdf file to final product (forced date formatting, not-visible-but-printable, etc.) but after bringing this to the attention of the developer, I expect we will see that resolved with upcoming updates.
reviews.author: Mark Simpson

reviews.title: Absolutely worthless!  Where is the touch-fill-go for android?
reviews.comment: Can not do anything with pdf documents that are scanned in....100% of what I deal with!  Highly disappointed!

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: Does anybody out there have this phone and was able to get this to work. It does not reconize/find any of my pdf files on card or phone or google drive. Or does anybody know a app like this that works?
reviews.author: Brad Proulx

reviews.title: Overall good, simple, and easy to use.
reviews.comment: It does have one rather baffling shortcoming, though. Why no support for formulas? On forms where you have to enter numbers and there is a total column that is calculated, you have to total it up yourself and enter it. Very strange. Otherwise would be a five-star app.
reviews.author: Darius Spearman

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I needed. Easier here on my phone with this app than the paid app I use on iPad.
reviews.author: Keith Ritner

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: It says that if you can not fill your pdf form in acrobat reader than you can not fill it in this app. FOR YOUR INFORMATION, I can fill so many pdf format form in acrobat reader but when I try to use your app it simply doesn\'t recognise and it doesn\'t even open my pdf file. Sort your app out and your claim as well \"if doesn\'t work in acrobat reader then it won\'t work in your app either\" BULLSHIT
reviews.author: Faz Fazal

reviews.title: Can\'t see what you are filling out.
reviews.comment: It turns the PDF into a list with names like \"Form Field 0 (1)\" and the numbers increase. Rarely does it tell you what field you are filling out. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Dean
